definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The proposal has "validated" and "legitimated" the city today, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他说，提案于今日生效并合法化。

sentences.english: Nadia's story doesn't easily lend itself to either side of the legalization debate.
sentences.chinese: 娜迪娅的经历不能单纯支持合法化辩论的任何一方。

sentences.english: Does legalisation make their punters more tender?
sentences.chinese: 合法化是否令她们的嫖客更温柔？

sentences.english: There has been a threefold increase in ectopic pregnancies in the U.S. since abortion was legalized.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，堕胎合法化后异位妊娠的发病率升高了3倍。

sentences.english: The statute legalizing lottery existed as early as 1847.
sentences.chinese: 在1847年，澳门已有赌博合法化的法令。
纽约将同性婚姻合法化。

sentences.english: Finally, we propose some future research directions on new venture growth based on legitimization.
sentences.chinese: 最后提出了新企业合法化成长研究的未来方向。

sentences.english: Should voluntary euthanasia &physician-assisted suicide be legalized ?
Being short of inculpation legalizes the criminal offence of secret policemen in criminal investigation.
sentences.chinese: 卧底警察在侦查中的犯罪行为合法化，不具有可罚性。

sentences.english: His parents'subsequent marriage resulted in his legitimation.
sentences.chinese: 他父母随后的结婚令他的身份得以合法化。

sentences.english: Eventually, possession and sale of recreational drugs will be decriminalized.
sentences.chinese: 最后，藏有及售卖与康乐将毒品合法化。

sentences.english: Marijuana is already practically legal in many parts of the US.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，在美国的许多地区，大麻已经合法化了。

sentences.english: The Trade Union Act of 1871 legalized the trade unions and gave financial security.
sentences.chinese: 年通过的《工会法》使工会合法化并给其财政保障。

sentences.english: Legalization reduces or eliminates all of these burdens.
sentences.chinese: 而对违禁品的合法化能减轻甚至消除这些负担。

sentences.english: Decriminalization of euthanasia is actually equal to acknowledgement of people's right for death by law.
sentences.chinese: 安乐死合法化实际上就是法律对人的死亡权的认可。

sentences.english: This was the birth or, if we prefer to call it so, the legitimation of Gallicanism.
sentences.chinese: 这是出生或，如果我们喜欢将它命名为如此，合法化。
